backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor module with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and styling updates of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus dark/neon OKLCH variable definitions and global utility applications.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling page navigation and wrapping content in a forced-dark ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five icon buttons and compact minimalist styling.
frontend/src/components/LiveCalendarWidg: Live-updating time/date display with a compact month grid highlighting the current day.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive React context managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file since Zustand handles all data without backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and custom utility/component classes including neon color styles.
frontend/src/lib/calories.ts: Provides calorie calculation using DeepSeek AI with fallback formulas for gym and cardio activities.
frontend/src/lib/deepseek.ts: Implements DeepSeek API calls and wrappers for exercise and nutrition data, including calorie estimators.
frontend/src/lib/indianNutrition.ts: Empty placeholder module for Indian nutrition data.
frontend/src/lib/mevsa.ts: Empty placeholder module for MEVSA functionality.
frontend/src/lib/nutrition.ts: Fetches nutrition data using DeepSeek with a fallback 100g nutrition database and local calculation logic.
frontend/src/lib/store.ts: Zustand store managing daily data, study topics, gym activities, nutrition entries, and goal/streak tracking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page computing and displaying daily study, gym, nutrition, calorie, and goals metrics.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Renders daily goals with progress, auto-tracked states, and a school attendance toggle affecting calories.
frontend/src/pages/Gym.tsx: Manages gym and cardio activity logging with calorie calculations and displays total burned calories and muscles trained.
frontend/src/pages/Nutrition.tsx: Allows adding food entries with fetched nutrition data and shows total intake, burned calories, and net calories.
frontend/src/pages/Study.tsx: Handles creation and status updates of study topics, showing progress across done, pending, and later categories.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, animations, and extended theme settings for the app's neon aesthetic.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements and existing features for adding a compact real-time calendar widget and related UI refinements.
